casebody.data:
Steven C. WHITE, individually, and in his capacity as member and manager of Affirmed Technologies, LLC; Joel Quaid, in his capacity as manager of Affirmed Technologies, LLC; and William Milks, in his capacity as manager of Affirmed Technologies, LLC, Appellants,
v.
Dwight J. BAUM, as Trustee for the Dwight C. and Hildagarde E. Baum Trust, individually and derivatively on behalf of Affirmed Technologies, LLC, a Nevada limited liability company; Robert Benjamin; Diane Benjamin; Joe Mloganoski; Nancy Skallerup; Dan Skinner; Denise Skinner; Gerald Skinner; Jeff Yonce ; and Joyce Yonce, individually, Respondents. No. 71199 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED SEPTEMBER 28, 2018

AFFIRMED.
